//import image

import wishLogo from "../Constant/wishlogo.png"

export default {
  backgroundColor:`${Colors.blue}`,
  frontImage:"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/xEBakpPa207tLVc_xoU-WobW5n_0L2rTh1wLXW9CJ0Bh9SmRZAa9iAKENDe7kJKw8DWtZ6SeMY0hKCS6xxy4Of7epVfUNx4bNw0HvdXdNA57LQIz06GPkUDoNIWOtQRqF46hTBMohgpTxFoA0LkxtnT1UeAsp57LRoSQ05B9PK2w6aH494XOG3BH49i-A4zp_qXqAjBhUaSJtAqisJLSiFmOjwzxFBcAPzOx3WzCuFyd2KhhkuVEuniQ66NU-J-r6CMGcDBZyNIE3EMhMUtZjuBJx286GoH12KG5KfcmrbrvgDqV39bx9duu86gPFmyBRfLo2xMMrxkRFX2-ZBq39T4qa3Lj1TFq13hflezCBjC4hGRbWmfBIIQPf6ohkxDlJcsmQDsIabKiT8QoXBkLv9USMcXn1ZidONwN7SYUhgsXv5Le8dlMSK05QgVjIG-AAFdahK-7hWimHfVAGl2GIDMt09nQJl-iVjtsPnJwM3lih6-QUdWcd34OcQsuameMuP2fiVA5Ce4Q-yWbrFBRhWoN-DxsAzgzqqYe374XVdG9HWdGyFMgFTr2P2fiPI60JjraY3D7bBtuIip9Rs6PoItxmk3Z6TmdZNJfV95ZB3V9Icwx3xivgY5bgsJ9zEfNIQOZwbxL00otkTQZrPBLFymGy99kNsKCJTPtJik_zqOYLDsV4NroqExD1e8VnA=w680-h682-no?authuser=0",
  heroImage: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/IAFgG7t4Vs2vUSIFO3AkpEfhXI1su8NejH31f216NOPsbwG_-Gh6xFFzuGD_lumjd1Wxj7C0e-siwnAU_e7wyMAH4qm8z3aX44T7LBHKhHFoCg2YCjIMcX8X6xaTyvJnK0x8XLh5feAacByZNgJLR4mhFiFslpP913fsBqbXi5sjXh-4lbGnphCHyWmMsK7Nnelp8RBqOCf_YjFlTX_OAwQykKDbI6YQVqvDTsNCRgEMxaokwMd6UrmzS7qeodjuFaXXUI9_OzaAPi5gjvJLOvWFh0iGd8oQyYKmpimVh5ZgPSgqItpb4UN_Ta4PW3q4I1gWg28PS9U7DyYlNIcxJP9Yuh99f8CxKLD5J6m3ay-T_eR4kI0F-xHb01BBoXJeozIfrycSnFrQtSPexr4mCg5I3GS5nAvvKaxPT3lPQUP4UsNMzmWLsUV6QLSocqDRXbqYw2eUCW4Zj1C3gJY73AnCp05sqpaVUnMwIREL5blG3u4JNi7Yl_rl35qLrl8T36zuKbihSPRSkvPaHBJkGBFyGTSPn-WoA-AJjb1EnJm9VmccQIbY_-5AXcT1TABqPiCtzbo_wCaKeZe6zsJks61WW1FRAuJok7O56dh9_qCE_-otj0io2yJKvXngCKr6xEeEoFmFSN-tkQVZtXGV0_7ry19OIw8HJfHWommgGhxeVulhsTag5S6RJ24pQQ=w2732-h1230-no?authuser=0",
  program:wishLogo,

  //
  projectId: "Cash On Delivery",
  projectHightlight: "People in SEA can use Cash On Delivery as a Payment method",
  projectIntro: `Wish now offer users in SEA the Cash On Delivery payment option. 
  People can buy product at Wish without any concerns and they
  can pay the product to the carrier. We wish this new payment will help
  increase the unique buyers in the SEA market`,
  projectMetrics: [
    "+GMV", "+ New Users", "A/B Test", "SEA Initiative"
  ],
  contributers: [
    {
      name: "Hank Ke",
      title: "Product Designer Intern @Wish",
      image: "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/NeQQCxC9No-LUZFPOpSzrBXDzg-37k9zedf9AeLQI7yNbZeBdI3TiJOCX592YNmCMd99jTuzXuJicy8JtMmBoJa2DfB7ujk6OHzgGvpVvEGM4yccHG_kkXhLcK3GGpjAyGJ0PzXERcZMRts0p4-PUqaOfTPMMTxhBOW1ESNspXqKqvCgLyBtme_o6n2yv1BTiH62nM8Xg4VSw0f1U-ieiSUGIZVLY-cIaGqimDPjzPG1nkVVmz9GIynHvTwnKVnBvJxllom985RPbd1m_nnl5OS4ah6ZLapQ0BstLqNfvpnF3K3dcAJVsZcy5Hlkx-Nk3TUKEzlWOPF0zA95iUvz7hRQJ-l8oZqAkbxqAuH7ysXU4nXY_oQXwsXoHp0oUH9vEbnyj8wKnWPDYSpDHyRFWfOOsCa2uSJ2nVm-qUw9TSsrBIj56zP9dQz3iAmND-lDYb_vdHR1teE3FWItBeq_8_YwYblZDhpe1th1-JVdZ_UNsVmLE3vnGanVASh2ocBKfHyTk1aozfAmtQhjRzS3NQHeSPBdMt2-jHk-C_Ym8GhlL0VmchFGSJKjo41E5oEmdDVvFuIFPKyWlfXN7UuUv1jQk4jxsd066Psjh_m4Bz0wECS8qdsF-kCpY_BiWKQgHeCskAKQt5QVcSOarNKC7_4J3wDX7FpCA1Nf6wH8r9FcvFCGrX-8NlzUMkV6jg=w932-h1375-no?authuser=0",
      url: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/samlicmu/"
    },
    {
      name: "Sam Li",
      title: "Product Manager-Special Projects @Wish",
      image: "https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C5603AQFnjuYGEhA7uA/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0?e=1596672000&v=beta&t=T3FNx8oBVR7DxpH1c5ycIwKf13eSKR0CAWUMSwL10Zs",
      url: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/samlicmu/"
    },
    {
      name: "Brandon Wirakesuma",
      title: "General Manager-Southeast Asia @Wish",
      image: "https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQGpaH-4N9jWWQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0?e=1596672000&v=beta&t=dWBT9WHQGB9E-RfAr_Q-vSrO3xa0OJTj2DOLKwhlRP4",
      url: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/brandonwirakesuma/"
    }
  ],
  contentDetails: [
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?mobile,app",
      subTitle: "Why Do We Need This Feature?",
      content: `
      Wish wants to expand the international impression in the South East Asia. 
      Howerver, the past high-level strategies (promotion, coupon...) that target
      to SEA didn't work very well.
      So we want to find more specific strategies to increase the new users acquicition and GMV at SEA.
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?mobile,app",
      subTitle: "We Need Test Asumption",
      content: `
      The market insights generated by the marketing team showed that 60% of e-commerce transactions
      are still completed via Cash on Delivery. This pay-later-option
      can reduce the trail cost and barrier of buying a product at Wish, and it can help bond truth with users.
      As a result, it will increase the new user acquicition, unique buyer conversion rate.
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?mobile,app",
      subTitle: "A/B Test Plan",
      content: `
      We want to understand how would Cash On Delivery effect to Wish's performance,
      thus we set up 50% users as a control group, keeping them on the current payment
      experience, and promote Cash on Delivery to another 50% users. 
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "false",
      url: "https://overflow.io/embed/ACZ011",
      subTitle: "Flow1: Promote Cash On Delivery",
      content: `
      Considered that Cash on Delivery is a common thing in SEA, I conducted 
      a user study in order to map out and understand users' current experience and the 
      painpoints of using it. `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?mobile,app",
      subTitle: "Scoope Down & Design",
      content: `
      In order to solve that....
      `
    },
    {
      isImage: "true",
      url: "https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?mobile,app",
      subTitle: "Final Flow",
      content: ""
    }
  ]
}
